benchmark_details.name: CUGE (Chinese Language Understanding and Generation Evaluation benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: CUGE is a benchmark proposed for evaluating general-purpose language intelligence through a hierarchical framework organizing datasets by language capabilities, tasks, and datasets, complemented by a multi-level scoring strategy.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive and systematic evaluation of general-purpose language intelligence in the Chinese language.

data.source: CUGE includes 21 representative datasets selected from existing resources based on their relevance to language capabilities and tasks.

methodology.calculation: Scores are normalized based on a representative baseline model's performance to eliminate influences of different metrics.
methodology.interpretation: Scores across various tasks are aggregated and normalized to reflect model performance distinctly.
